name: Mount Zurich
summary: Escape to this luxurious cabin nestled in the heart of the Pocono Mountains, ideal for family gatherings, corporate retreats, or a getaway with friends. This spacious cabin accommodates up to 14 guests.

hero.title: Welcome to Mount Zurich
hero.subtitle: Escape to this luxurious cabin nestled in the heart of the Pocono Mountains, ideal for family gatherings, corporate retreats, or a getaway with friends.

content.overview:
Nestled in the Pocono Mountains, Mount Zurich sleeps 14 guests across five bedrooms plus a sleeping loft. The open-concept great room features soaring ceilings, a cozy fireplace, and floor-to-ceiling windows framing the forest. A fully equipped gourmet kitchen with granite countertops makes group cooking a breeze.

Outdoors, the expansive deck hosts an XL 8-person hot tub, BBQ grill, and fire pit—perfect for stargazing. The game room keeps everyone entertained with pool, darts, and board games.

Minutes from Camelback, Kalahari Waterpark, Lake Wallenpaupack, and Delaware Water Gap, Mount Zurich is your year-round base for adventure and relaxation.
content.location: Located in the Pocono Mountains of Pennsylvania, USA. Near Camelback Mountain Resort, Kalahari Resorts & Conventions, Lake Wallenpaupack, Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area, Tobyhanna State Park, and Mount Airy Casino. Approximately 90 minutes from New York City, 2 hours from Philadelphia, and 30 minutes from Scranton.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: 1 king bed with en-suite bathroom and premium linens.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: 1 queen bed with cozy mountain-inspired décor.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: 2 double beds and 1 single bed, ideal for families or groups.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: 1 double bed and 3 single beds, perfect for larger groups or kids.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: 1 double bed in a quiet corner of the cabin.

rooms.name: Sleeping Loft
rooms.description: Additional sleeping space with a cozy loft atmosphere.

air: Wilkes‑Barre/Scranton International Airport (AVP) – approximately 45 minutes away
Lehigh Valley International Airport (ABE) – approximately 47 minutes away
Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR) – approximately 90 minutes away
rail: Amtrak service to Scranton or New York City with car rental

hosts.bio: Dedicated team available 24/7 to ensure your perfect mountain getaway.

testimonials.quote: This was one of the best Airbnbs I've stayed at — kitchen was well stocked, bathrooms felt luxurious, beds were comfortable, and everything was extremely clean!
The level of dedication and detail in the space is outstanding, easily the most beautiful Airbnb I have ever stayed at. Absolutely 10/10 experience! A must stay!!
Mount Zurich was such a beautiful place to stay! The hosts have thought of everything a group could need. The house is immaculately clean and so well decorated. It was truly such a fantastic weekend!

The cabin itself was a charming blend of rustic charm and modern comfort. If you're looking for a flawless escape where location, comfort, and charm align perfectly—this cabin is it. Five stars all around!
From the moment you pull into the driveway you're in awe. The heated bathroom floors, the hot tub, everything was beautifully done. I'd come back here in a heartbeat!
We've stayed in Poconos homes every year and this has been by far our favorite. We were skeptical at first at how gorgeous it looked in pictures, but this was the real deal!

faq.q: Can you arrange private transfers?
faq.a: Yes. We offer private transfers from nearby airports and train stations. Rates are available upon request.

faq.q: What is the transfer time from major airports?
faq.a: Approximately 90 minutes from NYC airports, 2 hours from Philadelphia, and 30–45 minutes from Scranton (AVP), depending on traffic and weather.

faq.q: Where exactly is Mount Zurich located?
faq.a: Mount Zurich is located in the Pocono Mountains of Pennsylvania, near Camelback Mountain, Kalahari Indoor Waterpark, Lake Wallenpaupack, Delaware Water Gap, Tobyhanna State Park, and Mount Airy Casino.

faq.q: What attractions are nearby?
faq.a: Guests enjoy easy access to Camelback Mountain for skiing and snowboarding, Kalahari Indoor Waterpark, Lake Wallenpaupack for water sports, Delaware Water Gap and Tobyhanna State Park for hiking, Mount Airy Casino, Skirmish Paintball, Lost Trails ATV, Sunset Hill Shooting Range, and more.

faq.q: Is the location private and secluded?
faq.a: Yes, the cabin is nestled in the woods offering excellent privacy, while still being a short drive to major attractions, restaurants, and shops.

faq.q: How far is Tobyhanna State Park?
faq.a: Tobyhanna State Park is only about 7 minutes away by car. It offers a beautiful lake, beach area with bathrooms and showers, hiking trails, and seasonal boat rentals for kayaking and more.

faq.q: What can we do at Lake Wallenpaupack?
faq.a: At Lake Wallenpaupack, you can rent boats, go kayaking, fishing, or simply enjoy the lake views and lakeside restaurants. Pine Crest Marina, for example, offers boat rentals for guests who want to explore the lake.

faq.q: What restaurant options are nearby?
faq.a: There are many local options, from casual to upscale. Popular spots include Desaki Restaurant, Spanky's Breakfast & Lunch, John’s Italian Restaurant, Cakes & Scones Bakery, The Dock on Wallenpaupack, and The Water’s Edge Restaurant.

faq.q: Where can we go for a fun dinner with great vibes?
faq.a: The Dock on Wallenpaupack is a guest favorite for good food and great vibes by the lake. Desaki Restaurant is also highly recommended for a fun night out.

faq.q: Is there a good breakfast place close by?
faq.a: Yes. Spanky's Breakfast & Lunch is a nearby option for a quick, tasty breakfast. Cakes & Scones Bakery is also great if you’re in the mood for fresh baked goods and coffee.

faq.q: Can we order pizza, wine, and beer to the cabin?
faq.a: Yes. John’s Italian Restaurant offers pizza and also delivers wine and beer, making it a convenient option for a cozy night in.

faq.q: What winter activities are nearby?
faq.a: Camelback Mountain offers skiing, snowboarding, and snow tubing during the winter season. Kalahari Indoor Waterpark is also open year-round for water fun regardless of the weather.

faq.q: What summer activities are available?
faq.a: In summer you can enjoy kayaking, boating, and fishing on nearby lakes, hiking at Tobyhanna State Park and Delaware Water Gap, ATV riding at Lost Trails, horseback riding at Mountain Creek Riding Stables, and waterparks like Kalahari or Camelback.

faq.q: Are there hiking trails nearby?
faq.a: Yes. Tobyhanna State Park, Delaware Water Gap, and various local trails offer great hiking options for different levels.

faq.q: Is there paintball nearby?
faq.a: Yes. Skirmish Paintball Fields offer acres of paintball courses and is a popular all-season activity for groups.

faq.q: Can we go horseback riding?
faq.a: Yes. Mountain Creek Riding Stables offers guided horseback rides through the mountains and is a favorite for families and couples.

faq.q: Is there an indoor waterpark close by?
faq.a: Kalahari Indoor Waterpark is one of the best indoor waterparks in the area and is just a short drive from the cabin.

faq.q: Are there ATV or off-road trails?
faq.a: Yes. Lost Trails offers miles of ATV mountain trails for guests who want an off-road adventure. Rentals and guided rides are available through local outfitters.

faq.q: Can we rent a boat nearby?
faq.a: Yes. Pine Crest Marina and other local marinas at Lake Wallenpaupack offer boat rentals so you can enjoy the lake during your stay.

faq.q: Is there a shooting range in the area?
faq.a: Yes. Sunset Hill Shooting Range is nearby and offers firearm experiences for beginners and experienced shooters alike, with professional supervision.

faq.q: How many guests can the hot tub accommodate?
faq.a: The XL hot tub comfortably fits up to 8 guests.

faq.q: What is the bed configuration?
faq.a: The cabin has 5 bedrooms plus a sleeping loft with a mix of king, queen, full, and twin beds, comfortably accommodating up to 14 guests.

faq.q: What entertainment is available?
faq.a: The game room features a pool table, darts, and board games, and the cabin includes Smart TVs with streaming services for movies and shows.

faq.q: Is there outdoor dining space?
faq.a: Yes. The expansive deck includes a BBQ grill, outdoor dining area, and multiple seating areas for lounging and meals outside.

faq.q: Is there a fire pit?
faq.a: Yes. There is an outdoor fire pit where you can gather for s’mores and stargazing in the evenings, subject to local fire regulations.

faq.q: How reliable is the internet?
faq.a: High-speed Wi-Fi is available throughout the property and is suitable for remote work, streaming, and video calls.

faq.q: What TV/streaming services are available?
faq.a: The cabin features Smart TVs that support popular streaming apps such as Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and others (use your own accounts to log in).

faq.q: Is there a hospital nearby?
faq.a: Yes. Lehigh Valley Hospital–Pocono is approximately 15–20 minutes away by car, and urgent care options are also available in the area.

faq.q: Do you have first aid on site?
faq.a: Yes. A basic first aid kit is available in the cabin for minor issues.

faq.q: Is the cabin suitable for children?
faq.a: Yes. The cabin is family-friendly with games, entertainment, and nearby activities suitable for kids and teens. Parents should supervise children at all times, especially around the hot tub, deck, and fire pit.

faq.q: Do you have a crib or high chair?
faq.a: Yes. A Pack ’n Play-style travel crib and a high chair are available for infants upon request.

faq.q: Is the hot tub safe for kids?
faq.a: Children must be supervised by an adult at all times in and around the hot tub. We also recommend limiting time and adjusting the temperature for younger guests.

faq.q: What is the cancellation policy?
faq.a: We offer a full refund if you cancel at least 60 days prior to arrival. Inside 60 days, payments are non-refundable unless we’re able to re-book the dates. We strongly recommend travel insurance for extra protection.

faq.q: Do you accept credit cards?
faq.a: Yes. We accept major credit cards such as Visa, MasterCard, and American Express via a secure payment link or booking platform.

faq.q: Is there a security deposit?
faq.a: Yes. A refundable security deposit is required. It is typically released within 48 hours of checkout after the property has been inspected for damages.

faq.q: Is the cabin wheelchair accessible?
faq.a: The main level is generally accessible and includes key living spaces, but some areas have steps or changes in level. Please contact us with your specific needs so we can confirm suitability.

faq.q: Is the cabin pet-friendly?
faq.a: Pets may be allowed on a case-by-case basis with prior approval and an additional cleaning fee. Please inquire before booking if you wish to bring a pet.

faq.q: What is the best time to visit?
faq.a: The Pocono Mountains are a year-round destination: winter for skiing and snow fun, summer for lakes and outdoor activities, fall for foliage, and spring for quieter stays and mild weather.

faq.q: Is there air conditioning and heating?
faq.a: Yes. All bedrooms and main living areas are fully air-conditioned and heated, making the cabin comfortable in every season.

faq.q: What is the minimum stay?
faq.a: The standard minimum stay is typically 2–3 nights, with longer minimums during peak holiday periods and special weekends.

faq.q: How far in advance should we book for high season?
faq.a: For peak seasons (ski season, summer, and fall foliage), we recommend booking 3–6 months in advance. For regular dates, 1–2 months ahead is usually sufficient, subject to availability.

faq.q: What are the smoking rules?
faq.a: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the cabin. Guests may smoke outdoors in designated areas only and must safely dispose of cigarette butts.

faq.q: Are there quiet hours?
faq.a: Yes. Quiet hours are strictly enforced during the nighttime. Please keep music and outdoor noise low in the evenings and at night out of respect for neighbors and community rules. Parties or loud disturbances are not permitted.

faq.q: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faq.a: Standard check-in is at 3:00 PM and check-out is at 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out may be possible depending on cleaning schedules and availability; please ask in advance.

faq.q: Is the cabin suitable for corporate retreats?
faq.a: Yes. Mount Zurich is ideal for executive retreats and team offsites, with multiple gathering areas, fast Wi-Fi, and nearby activities for team-building.

faq.q: Is the Wi-Fi strong enough for video conferences?
faq.a: Yes. The internet connection is strong enough for multiple guests to participate in video conferences and work remotely at the same time.

seoLong: Mount Zurich is one of the most sought-after luxury cabin rentals in the Pocono Mountains of Pennsylvania, offering a private, secluded setting surrounded by breathtaking natural beauty. This exceptional property combines rustic charm with modern luxury for an unforgettable mountain getaway.

Perfect for family gatherings, corporate retreats, and friend getaways, the cabin features 5 beautifully appointed bedrooms plus a sleeping loft, accommodating up to 14 guests. Highlights include an XL hot tub, game room with pool table, cozy fireplace, and expansive deck with BBQ.

Mount Zurich represents the pinnacle of luxury cabin rentals in the Poconos. Its secluded forest location and thoughtful design create a peaceful sanctuary ideal for relaxation, celebration, and creating lasting memories with loved ones.

Located near Camelback Mountain, Kalahari Waterpark, Lake Wallenpaupack, and the Delaware Water Gap, Mount Zurich offers year-round adventure. Whether you're seeking winter skiing, summer water sports, or fall foliage, this cabin is the perfect base for your Pocono adventure.

seo.title: Mount Zurich | Luxury Cabin in the Poconos | Private Mountain Retreat
seo.description: Escape to this luxurious 5-bedroom cabin in the Pocono Mountains. Hot tub, game room, fireplace, and stunning views. Perfect for families, groups, and corporate retreats. Sleeps 14 guests.
